remarks: Lemma for ~ ordtbas .  In a total order, unbounded-above intervals are closed under intersection.  (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 3-Sep-2015.)
statement:
ordtval.1 $e |- X = dom R $.
ordtval.2 $e |- A = ran ( x e. X |-> { y e. X | -. y R x } ) $.
ordtbaslem $p |- ( R e. TosetRel -> ( fi ` A ) = A ) $.
$d R x y $.
$d X x y $.
